This template showcases a user interface (UI) panel that you can move around in 3D space.

<b>On Desktop: Click</b> and drag the panel's border to reposition it.\
<b>In XR: Pinch</b> and drag the panel's border to reposition it.\
<b>Key Component:</b> This functionality is powered by `xb.SpatialPanel` and managed by `UIManager.js`.

import { DocsIFrame } from '../DocsIFrame.jsx';
import { DocsSource } from '../DocsSource.jsx';

<DocsIFrame template="1_ui"></DocsIFrame>
<DocsSource template="1_ui"></DocsSource>
<DocsSource template="1_ui" filename="UIManager.js"></DocsSource>
